# cameraBoundary

**Instance Property**

A constraint of the location of the center of the map.

## Declaration

```swift
get cameraBoundary(): CameraBoundaryDescription | null;
set cameraBoundary(cameraBoundary: null | CoordinateRegion | MapRect);
```

## Return Value

An object containing both [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateRegion] and [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapRect] instances.

## Discussion

Setting this property requires either a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateRegion] or a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapRect] instance as a value. Getting the property returns an object containing both [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateRegion] and [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapRect] instances.

## Defining a Camera Boundary

- **CameraBoundaryDescription**: An object literal that contains information defining an area on the map.

## Manipulating the visible portion of the map

- **center**: The map coordinate at the center of the map view.
- **setCenterAnimated(coordinate, animated)**: Centers the map to the provided coordinate, with optional animation.
- **region**: The area the map is displaying.
- **setRegionAnimated(region, animated)**: Changes the map’s region to the provided region, with optional animation.
- **rotation**: The map’s rotation, in degrees.
- **setRotationAnimated(degrees, animated)**: Changes the map’s rotation setting to the number of specified degrees.
- **visibleMapRect**: The visible area of the map, in map units.
- **setVisibleMapRectAnimated(mapRect, animated)**: Changes the map’s visible map rectangle to the specified map rectangle.
- **setCameraBoundaryAnimated(mapRect, animated)**: Changes the map’s camera boundary with an animated transition.
- **CameraBoundaryDescription**: An object literal that contains information defining an area on the map.
- **cameraDistance**: The altitude of the camera relative to the elevation of the center of the map.
- **setCameraDistanceAnimated(distance, animated)**: Changes the map’s camera distance with an animated transition.
- **cameraZoomRange**: The minimum and maximum distances of the camera from the map center.
- **setCameraZoomRangeAnimated(cameraZoomRange, animated)**: Changes the map’s camera zoom range with an animated transition.
